scripts.release:patch: pnpm --filter @slayzone/app exec npm version patch && pnpm release:tag
scripts.release:minor: pnpm --filter @slayzone/app exec npm version minor && pnpm release:tag
scripts.release:major: pnpm --filter @slayzone/app exec npm version major && pnpm release:tag
scripts.release:tag: VERSION=$(node -p "require('./packages/apps/app/package.json').version") && git add packages/apps/app/package.json && git commit -m "release: v$VERSION" && git tag "v$VERSION" && git push && git push --tags
